page.title: 06Financing of CARE
page.content: Currently (1984/85) the cost to CARE of keeping a villager is Â£137 per week.This includes all facilities, workshops,social amienities & welfare. There are three sections to the financig of care,these are :- (1) The CARE Trust Fund which owns the properties & holds & invests funds to be used in building programmes. (2) CARE Ltd. which pays for the day-to-day running of the villages ,this is funded mainly by fees charged to the Local Authorities in the areas which the villagers come from,and D.H.S.S. grants. (3) The CARE Village Sales Ltd. which exists for the purpose of marketing the articles manufactured in the villages,items such as Christmas Cards.The surplus from this operation is covenented to CARE Ltd.
